subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The former Niagara coach Joe Mihalich, taking over a men’s team that has just four returnees from a seven-win, turmoil-filled season, is trying to rebuild the program.
snippet: The former Niagara coach Joe Mihalich, taking over a men’s team that has just four returnees from a seven-win, turmoil-filled season, is trying to rebuild the program.
